info.name: Facebook Background Generator (christmas)
info.description: Various christmas themed wallpapers for my White Facebook theme. Comes with season specific FB logo. Choose from six different images, and override the theme's plain white background. pfeiffer stylez is also on Facebook.
info.additionalInfo: This is not a stand-alone style, just the background. You'll also need the White Facebook theme to get what you see in the preview images.

options.label: one
options.value: background: #f5f5f5 url("http://i.imgur.com/3BwOKoB.jpg") top center no-repeat fixed !important;
